(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/Makefile\.am$
ignore$
\.avi$
\.gz$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.po$
\.wav$
\.zip$
^docs/extensiondir\.xml\.in$
^test/mocklibc/src/Makefile\.am$
^test/polkit/meson\.build$
^\.github/
